parts.text: {"word":"resolving","priority":"★★☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"解決する、解明する、解消する","english_definition":"to find a solution to (a problem, dispute, etc.).","examples":[{"sentence":"We need to find a way of resolving the conflict.","translation":"私たちはその紛争を解決する方法を見つける必要があります。"},{"sentence":"The company is resolving the technical issues.","translation":"会社は技術的な問題を解決しています。"},{"sentence":"Mediation can be helpful in resolving disputes.","translation":"調停は紛争解決に役立ちます。"}],"collocations":["resolve a problem (問題を解決する)","resolve a conflict (紛争を解決する)","resolve a dispute (論争を解決する)","resolve an issue (問題を解決する)","resolve a crisis (危機を乗り越える)"],"synonyms":["solve","settle","fix","clear up","iron out"],"antonyms":["aggravate","worsen","exacerbate","complicate"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"決意する、決定する、議決する","english_definition":"":"to decide firmly on a course of action; to make a formal decision or express a formal opinion, usually by means of a vote.","examples":[{"sentence":"She resolved to quit her job.","translation":"彼女は仕事を辞めることを決意しました。"},{"sentence":"The committee resolved that the proposal should be approved.","translation":"委員会はその提案を承認することを議決しました。"},{"sentence":"He resolved to improve his health.","translation":"彼は健康を改善することを決意しました。"}],"collocations":["resolve to do something (～することを決意する)","resolve on something (～を決意する)","resolve that (～ということを議決する)"],"synonyms":["decide","determine","undertake","commit","purpose"],"antonyms":["hesitate","waver","doubt","vacillate"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(疑問などを)解く、明らかにする、説明する","english_definition":"to clear up or dispel (doubts, misunderstandings, etc.).","examples":[{"sentence":"The detective resolved the mystery.","translation":"探偵はその謎を解明しました。"},{"sentence":"Further investigation resolved the remaining questions.","translation":"さらなる調査で残りの疑問が解明されました。"},{"sentence":"His explanation resolved my confusion.","translation":"彼の説明で私の混乱は解消されました。"}],"collocations":["resolve a mystery (謎を解明する)","resolve doubts (疑念を晴らす)","resolve confusion (混乱を解消する)"],"synonyms":["clarify","explain","elucidate","unravel","decipher"],"antonyms":["obscure","confuse","complicate","muddle"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vi","definition":"(画像・音などが)判別できるようになる、解像度が上がる","english_definition":"(of an image, sound, etc.) to become clear or distinct.","examples":[{"sentence":"The image began to resolve as the focus was adjusted.","translation":"焦点を調整すると、画像が鮮明になり始めた。"},{"sentence":"The details of the distant object slowly resolved.","translation":"遠くの物体の細部がゆっくりと判別できるようになった。"}],"collocations":["image resolves (画像が鮮明になる)","details resolve (詳細が判別できるようになる)"],"synonyms":["become clear","sharpen","distinguish"],"antonyms":["blur","obscure","fade"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(光などを)分解する、分光する","english_definition":"(in physics) to separate or distinguish (components of light, energy, etc.).","examples":[{"sentence":"The prism resolved the white light into a spectrum of colors.","translation":"プリズムは白色光を色のスペクトルに分解した。"}],"collocations":["resolve light (光を分解する)","resolve energy (エネルギーを分解する)"],"synonyms":["separate","decompose","analyze"],"antonyms":["combine","synthesize"]}],"etymology":{"value":"ラテン語の「resolvere」（ほどく、解放する、解決する）に由来。re-（再び）+ solvere（ほどく、解く）から構成される。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/rɪˈzɒlvɪŋ/","syllables":"re-solv-ing"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_simple":["resolve","resolves"],"past_simple":"resolved","past_participle":"resolved","present_participle":"resolving"}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**resolving**」は動詞「resolve」の現在分詞形で、主に「解決する」「決意する」「解明する」といった意味で使用されます。問題や紛争を解決する、疑問や謎を解き明かす、何かをすることを決意するといった意味合いがあります。また、画像や音などが鮮明になる、光を分解するといった専門的な意味も持ちます。文脈によって意味が異なるため、注意が必要です。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ I'm resolving to go to the party.","correct":"✓ I've resolved to go to the party.","note":"「決意した」という完了した状態を表す場合は、現在完了形を使用するのが適切です。"},{"incorrect":"✗ The problem is resolve now.","correct":"✓ The problem is resolved now.","note":"「解決された」という状態を表す場合は、受動態の過去分詞を使用します。"},{"incorrect":"✗ Resolving the problem, I was happy.","correct":"✓ Having resolved the problem, I was happy. / ✓ After resolving the problem, I was happy.","note":"分詞構文で「問題を解決した後で」という意味を表す場合は、完了分詞構文（Having resolved...）または接続詞（After resolving...）を使用すると、時間的な順序が明確になります。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["resolve (動詞: 解決する、決意する / 名詞: 決意、決心)","resolution (名詞: 解決、決意、解像度)","resolute (形容詞: 断固とした、決然とした)","resolutely (副詞: 断固として、決然と)","resolver (名詞: 解決者、分解器)"],"phrasal_verbs":["resolve upon (～を決意する)","resolve into (～に分解する、～に変わる)"],"priority":"★★☆"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B2 (一般的な意味)、C1 (専門的な意味)","frequency_google_ngram":"中頻度 (Moderate frequency)","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B2","text":"「**resolving**」は、動詞「resolve」の現在分詞形で、いくつかの意味があります。最も一般的なのは、問題や紛争を「解決する」という意味です。また、何かをすることを「決意する」という意味や、謎や疑問を「解明する」という意味もあります。さらに、画像や音などが「鮮明になる」という意味や、光などを「分解する」という意味も持ちます。文脈によって意味が異なるため、注意が必要です。","priority":"★★☆"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"The company is **resolving** customer complaints as quickly as possible.","translation":"会社は顧客からの苦情をできるだけ早く解決しています。","type":"verb (vt)","meaning_category":"解決する"},{"sentence":"She is **resolving** to exercise more regularly.","translation":"彼女はもっと定期的に運動することを決意しています。","type":"verb (vt)","meaning_category":"決意する"},{"sentence":"Scientists are **resolving** the structure of the protein.","translation":"科学者たちはそのタンパク質の構造を解明しています。","type":"verb (vt)","meaning_category":"解明する"},{"sentence":"The telescope is **resolving** distant galaxies.","translation":"その望遠鏡は遠くの銀河を判別しています。","type":"verb (vi)","meaning_category":"判別できるようになる"},{"sentence":"The lens is **resolving** the light into its component colors.","translation":"そのレンズは光をその構成要素の色に分解しています。","type":"verb (vt)","meaning_category":"分解する"}]}
